transcript: Hi, I've been on the phone for an hour trying to get a little discrepancy on my bill fixed. I was charged for $200 worth of calls that I didn't make.

segments.text: Hi, I've been on the phone for an hour trying to get a little discrepancy on my bill fixed.
I was charged for $200 worth of calls that I didn't make.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Hi.  I've been on the phone for an hour trying to get a little discrepancy on my bill fixed.  I was charged for two hundred dollars worth of calls that I didn't make.
